articles.author: Ian O'ConnorESPN Senior Writer
articles.title: Patriots got the humbling loss they probably needed
articles.description: This was the same team that was getting thumped 28-3 for three quarters in the Super Bowl. And like that team, they have a history of responding to this kind of setback.

articles.author: Adam TeicherESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: All things are possible for the Chiefs after victory over Patriots
articles.description: Alex Smith and the Chiefs dismantled the defending champs on their home field Thursday, opening the season with a resounding 42-27 win.

articles.title: Tom Brady describes first game at 40, a stunning loss to Chiefs
articles.description: The Chiefs' Alex Smith outplays the Patriots QB and hands Bill Belichick his first loss in a home season opener since his debut as New England's head coach. Listen to Brady and Belichick talk about how it went down.

articles.title: Stephens beats Venus, gets Keys for US Open title
articles.description: Sloane Stephens ended Venus Williams' bid to become the oldest woman to win a Grand Slam title in the Open era. Stephens will face Madison Keys on Saturday, marking the first all-American US Open women's final since 2002.

articles.title: US Open - Nothing but positives can come out of US Open women's final
articles.description: Sloane Stephens and Madison Keys have a lot on the line, but the reality is that no matter who comes out on top in the US Open final, it's advantage USA.

articles.author: Matthew BerryESPN Senior Writer
articles.title: Love/Hate for Week 1
articles.description: The first week of the season is kind of like the first day of school, as you hope to get off on the right foot. Matthew helps set your expectations with players he loves and hates for Week 1.

articles.title: Play the No. 1 Fantasy Football game for free
articles.description: Create or join a fantasy football league for free and get expert analysis, live scoring, mock drafts, and more on ESPN

articles.title: The Dakulator: Some NFL stars clear Dak's salary in minutes
articles.description: The rookie pay scale is stacked against Dak. See how long it takes other NFL stars to earn Prescott's 2017 paycheck.

articles.author: Darren RovellESPN Senior Writer
articles.title: How Dak makes almost five times his NFL salary
articles.description: Dak Prescott might be the biggest bargain in football, but the Cowboys quarterback is finding ways to supplement his league-minimum earnings off the field.

articles.author: Dan GrazianoESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: QB Confidence Index: Preseason ranking of all 32 depth charts
articles.description: How confident is your favorite NFL team about its quarterback situation headed into the season? New England, Atlanta and Green Bay are set at the top, but this is about more than starters.
